page.title: 10SUPERNATURAL
page.content: {The Grange Lady}A white lady is said to haunt Hefferston Grange. One night my mum who was working at the Grange Hospital was waiting for my dad to pick her up. She was in the waiting room for about 30 minutes when she heard footsteps in the corridor. She looked but noone was there. She sat down again to hear the footsteps once more. This time she was too frightened to look so she locked the door. Ten minutes later Dad arrived. She never found out who's footsteps they were. {Haunted House}In a house on Beach Hill an old lady smelt burning in her kitchen. She rushed to see what it was and found her cooker on fire. She was overcome by the heat and smoke and the roof collapsed. When the firemen arrived they could find no trace of her. Today her screams can still be heard late at night when you pass.
